messages.title: Standing Up for Real Change
messages.content: Dear Voter, The Isle of Wight deserves an honest, hard-working MP, with the energy to stand up for the Island in Westminster. As a working man not a career politician, I pledge to reintroduce compassion to politics whilst offering a fresh approach. I believe in prioritising the issues which matter to Islanders – schools, jobs, health and social care, the roads and the ferries, in all these areas we can do better. With hard work and integrity, I believe we can make a positive difference to the Island. It is no more than we deserve.

issues.health: I believe in prioritising the issues which matter to Islanders – schools, jobs, health and social care
issues.socialWelfare: I believe in prioritising the issues which matter to Islanders – schools, jobs, health and social care
